name: Eve: Reborn
description:
Tears blot the ink of the freshly penned letter to her son...

Knowing she has to right a multitude of wrongs in her past doings, Evelyn tries uselessly to convey her emotions in her last letter as the prison transfer van makes it's way through the evening city traffic, then...

Evelyn wakes up cold and bruised on the floor. 

The heat from the flaming truck insists she scrambles to her feet and takes stock of her situation...

The truck has crashed, the transfer officer down, his gun laying nearby...

Before she has collected her thoughts, an eerie atmosphere takes over.

An ethereal fog creeps in and it begins to snow dried human flesh... what is happening?

Unearthly moans sound in the distance, ominous sounds can be heard nearby...

Evelyn takes the gun and begins her journey for the truth...

      

Eve: Reborn is a short psychological horror game with turn based combat elements that rely on strategy.

Supplies are scarce and enemies shift in and out between the dimensions.

You must use your wits and will to survive and overcome the challenges ahead.

Find clues that you will utilise to turn the tables on familiar foes as you make your way through the warped city.

Finally you uncover the truth as you face your nemesis at the very last...

You will then reflect on this harrowing tale of guilt, remorse and forgiveness as you play again from the beginning to unlock a different route to the finale.

  

Foreboding atmosphere where anything can happen.

Horrific monsters and logical puzzles will challenge your sanity.

Three difficulty settings so the game can be enjoyed by everyone.

Features a chilling soundtrack from favourite composers such as Murray Atkinson (used under license.)

Typical game time is 30mins - 1hour, with replay value using an alternative route.
